New Records: Buddy Hield made 6 out of 7 three-pointers in the first half, and he has made 12 out of 16 three-pointers in his first two games with the Warriors
Key Match Events: The Warriors used trapping defense to force turnovers and create open looks for their shooters, and Buddy Hield's immediate impact after entering the game was a turning point
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Jazz struggled shooting, finishing with a 31.5% field goal percentage, and the Warriors secured their second straight win over a team battling for a lottery position
